subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: {{Han compound|門|月|ls=ic|t1=door|t2=moon}} – moonlight peeking through a door – interstice; space (original character of {{zh-l|*間}}).

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|s=闲|t2=閑}}
{{zh-ref|Karlgren (1957)}} and {{zh-ref|Baxter (1992)}} connect this word with {{och-l|間|interstice time|id=1}}.

Alternatively, {{zh-ref|Pulleyblank (1973)}} suggests that it is cognate with {{och-l|暇|to be at leisure}}.

{{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} considers this unrelated to {{och-l|間}}, and instead proposes that this is borrowed from {{der|zh|tai}} languages, akin to {{cog|th|คร้าน||lazy; indolent}}. {{och-l|懶|lazy}} may be a colloquial reflex of the same word ([[ibid.]]).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# not [[busy]]; [[idle]]
#: {{zh-x|噇 飽 恰 '''閒'''。|Have nothing else to do. / Don't you have nothing else to do? / Mind your own concerns/business.|3=MD|tr=Chòng bā kák-èng.|link=yes|a=Cdo-fzho 噇飽恰閒.wav}}
# [[vacant]]; [[unoccupied]]; [[unused]]
# [[leisurely]] and [[carefree]]
# [[trivial]]; [[unimportant]]
# [[unrelated]] to one's [[proper]] [[business]]; [[extraneous]]; belonging to [[other]]s
# [[relaxed]]; [[peaceful]]; [[tranquil]]; [[calm]]
# [[leisure]]; [[spare]] [[time]]; [[free]] time
# {{lb|zh|gambling}} [[player]] (instead of [[banker]])
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
